top_problem_solved: We developed a cloud-based engineering design automation tool that generates outputs in all universal design formats within less than 20 seconds. Before implementing this solution, our clients needed high-configuration computers with costly CAD packages, including both 2D and 3D design software, and highly experienced design engineers to complete these engineering designs. With our automation tool, clients can now streamline the design process without relying on expensive hardware, specialized software, or advanced technical expertise. This solution is driving digitalization across industries such as valve manufacturing, valve automation, HVAC, vibration isolation, and expansion bellows, as well as other key areas in engineering, enabling faster, more efficient workflows that meet the demands of modern engineering.

my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favorite business stories is about how BNI helped me reconnect with someone from my past in the most unexpected way. I had a random BNI phone connect with someone I’d never met before. We hit it off and had a great conversation. Toward the end of the call, she said she wanted to introduce me to someone who could help me get more involved in BNI. That person turned out to be my college senior — someone I hadn’t spoken to in years and didn’t even recognize on the phone at first! We spoke for 30 minutes, and by the end of the conversation, he inducted me into BNI. It wasn’t until after the call that we both realized who the other person was. That moment reminded me just how powerful and small the world can be when you focus on genuine connections. BNI didn’t just help me grow my business — it helped me reconnect with my network in ways I never expected.
